body.p:
New Castle Ky
October 21st 63
To his Excellency, Gov Bramlett
Frankfort Ky
Sir

We the undersigned would respectfully recommend Wm B. Watts for the appointment of Leut Col for Henry Co. Mr. Watts is eminently qualified for the position, Being a man of Energy with considerable experiance in Military Affairs.
We feel confident that he will use every exertion to raise and organize a company in our County for the defense of our state against the invasion or raids of rebel guerillas.

H. M. Buckley
Thos. W. Robertson Capt 6th Ky
Jno S White
Geo.S. Hennston Clk Ci Court
The reccommendation of Col. H. M. Buckly, Capt Robertson & others, I should think sufficient
Jno C Manfort P J H C C

Henry Co Oct 21/63
Recom"d" for this county
Wm B Watts Lt Col
Warren Clubb Lt Col
H M Buckley
Issue as Colonel.
Boyle
New Castle.
Issued, 57, 300,

wrote recalling Com of Col Watts
see letter book p 66
